author: wn.com
title: Student stories – leading a company’s marketing strategy (Abertay University)
text: ( Source : Abertay University ) ‌ Rebecca Finan took on the huge responsibility of developing a new sales and marketing strategy for an established company this summer, as a Saltire Foundation scholarship. Interested in taking part next year?
